Ridiculous amount of replayability. Extremely fun and cooperative gameplay. Graphics are out of this roof for the PC requirements it's asking for. Buy buy buy!
Awesome game, for those who likes, to shoot some zombies with your friends at a lan party, or online, when you're bored.
Super fun time with friends

Great game for multi-player. If you're a bounch of friends camped with your computers at a friends house, then this game will be great fun for everyone to enjoy. 

It promotes teamwork, and in the beginning a group will struggle to complete even a simple task, but as you progress you'll learn to coordinate to survive a zombie apocalypse.

There's a good varity of playstyle in the game. You can go to battle with pyrotechnics, explosives, a chainsaw and a with a wide varity of guns! There's also a medic class for those you like to support their team in other ways than brutal killing.

Killing Floor ist die Art von Spiel bei dem man sich ein paar Kumpels holen muss um es richtig zugenießen da es für die meisten Solo-Spieler wohl zu eintönig wäre. Aber das soll keines Falls heißen das das Spiel an sich schlecht ist ich meine Gewalt + Makaberer Humor + mehrere tausend Liter (Film)blut und wolah sie haben Killing Floor.
A great team, survival and shooting game, a little RPG/leveling elements to it as well. Great way to kill some time and LOADs of undead.
Excellent game. It has deep and nuanced gameplay, though you won't appreciate it until the higher difficulties where balanced, coordinated teams are important.

Killing Floor is a Team Based Horde mode style game. It features 8 unique classes which as you complete challenges you level them up, and unlock perks for those classes. The game also features a shop, where you can exchange the money you earn for each wave, for weapons, at the end of each wave. Killing Floor is an old but good game, perfect for those who enjoy team based games, where team work is the key to survive the mutan onslaught. I recommend Killing Floor Highly.
